thread.title: Party Favor Takes GTA and Vince Staples' 'Little Bit of This' to The Grime Trap: Exclusive
thread.title_full: Party Favor Takes GTA and Vince Staples' 'Little Bit of This' to The Grime Trap: Exclusive

author: NHHMS
title: Party Favor Takes GTA and Vince Staples' 'Little Bit of This' to The Grime Trap: Exclusive
text:
Tim Mosenfelder/Getty Images 
Party Favor performs at Lake Tahoe Community College on Dec. 29, 2014 in South Lake Tahoe, Calif. 
Hand’s down one of the coolest tracks on GTA ‘s debut LP Good Times Ahead is “Little Bit of This,” featuring Vince Staples . As soon as the beat comes in, you know you’re in for something totally different. It’s wonky and funky, weird and cool at the same time. Staples’ raspy chill verses are perfect on top of the track’s otherworldly nature. 
It’s dark, but it’s also pretty uptempo, so when Party Favor was approached for the official remix, he saw a good opportunity to slow things down — the wonk turns down in favor of some grungy trap sounds. 
The remix is one of a few in a full package that sees official release Friday, Jan. 25, but you can listen to it’s sludgy goodness below exclusively on Billboard Dance . TAGS
